Package repositories

Class PostgreAdapter

java.lang.Object
repositories.PostgreAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
DataRepository
public class PostgreAdapter extends Object implements DataRepository
This PostgreAdapter class is an implementation of DataRepository.
Author:
Nguyen Duc Thang

    • findUserInPending

      public User findUserInPending(String username, String email)
      Description copied from interface: DataRepository
      This is called in Services when a user has been verified and we need to get the user out from tmp repo.
      Specified by:
      findUserInPending in interface DataRepository
      Parameters:
      username - a String showing the name of the verified user
      email - a String showing the email of the verified user
      Returns:
      a User which should be collected from the tmp repo.should return null if there is no such user.

    • deleteUser

      public int deleteUser(String username)
      Description copied from interface: DataRepository
      this is called when admin wants to delete a specific user.
      Specified by:
      deleteUser in interface DataRepository
      Parameters:
      username - : the name of the user the admin wants to delete
      Returns:
      int: the number of User deleted. Return 0 if username does not exist. In normal case it should return 1 because the username is unique.
